channel.title: Deleting an npc

item.title: Deleting an npc
item.dc:creator: @PatScape PatScape
item.description:
@PatScape wrote:

Ok, so during a case I made, an npc is spawned:

[code]server.npcHandler.newNPC(3382, absX, (absY + 1), heightLevel,

absX + 3, absY + 4, absX + 3, absY + 4, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(3382),

false);[/code]

Now, what do i need to do to delete it when a timer hits 0? I have the timer, I have it set at 200, and I have this in boolean process:

if(timer2 > 0){ timer2 -= 1; }

[br][size=1]Posted on: June 08, 2007, 01:24:00 PM[/size][hr]Goeperjimanaly. Anyone. please lmao.

Read full topic
